description: Whip up some dazzlingly fun pasta creations with the Play-Doh Noodle Makin' Mania playset, now with an exclusive 5-pack of glitter-infused Play-Doh compound! This variant set includes sparkle red, glittery blue, shimmering white, and more, alongside the noodle maker and accessories.

title: LEGO Star Wars X-Wing Starfighter (75355) - Red Five Collector's Edition
description: An exclusive Collector's Edition of the LEGO Star Wars X-Wing Starfighter. This variant features premium 'Red Five' packaging, a numbered certificate of authenticity, and an exclusive printed display plaque. The model itself is identical to the standard version, but the unboxing experience is enhanced for the ultimate collector.

description: Build your own beast with the Traxxas Stampede 4X4 VXL Assembly Kit, featuring a Toys'R'Us exclusive Blue Flame pre-painted body shell. This kit includes all the parts needed to assemble the legendary Stampede 4x4, just add your own battery and charger.

description: A classic wagon with a modern, fun twist. This All-Terrain Steel & Wood Wagon comes in a vibrant Princess Pink steel body, perfect for a stylish ride around the neighborhood or park. Features high wooden sides and rugged air tires for a smooth ride on any terrain.

title: Marvel Legends Series Captain America Shield - Stealth Force Edition
description: Wield the shield of a super-soldier with the Marvel Legends Captain America Shield, now in a limited Stealth Force Edition. This role play item features a unique navy blue and silver paint scheme, inspired by Cap's stealth suit. Full 1:1 scale, 24-inch diameter, with adjustable straps.

name: projects/toysrus-project/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/0/products/TRUVAR_STACKER_PASTEL
categories: Toys & Games > Baby & Toddler Toys > Early Development Toys
title: Fisher-Price Rock-a-Stack & Baby's First Blocks Bundle - Pastel Edition
description: A gentle and modern take on two classic baby toys. This bundle features the Rock-a-Stack and Baby's First Blocks in a beautiful pastel color palette, including mint green, soft peach, and lavender. Perfect for developing fine motor skills and hand-eye coordination.

categories: Toys & Games > Puzzles > Jigsaw Puzzles
title: Ravensburger Cosmic Jungle 1000pc Jigsaw Puzzle - Glow-in-the-Dark Edition
description: Experience the Cosmic Jungle in a new light! This special edition of the 1000-piece puzzle from Ravensburger features glow-in-the-dark highlights on the aliens and fauna, revealing hidden details when the lights go out. Made with Softclick Technology for a perfect fit.

categories: Toys & Games > Dolls, Playsets & Toy Figures > Dolls

title: Barbie 3-in-1 DreamCamper Vehicle and Playset - Lavender Edition
description: Travel and adventure await with the Barbie 3-in-1 DreamCamper! This special lavender edition features a unique color scheme. It includes a truck, a detachable camper that turns into a 3-story play area, and a boat. Packed with 50 accessories, it's ready for any journey.

description: A classic for a reason! The Radio Flyer All-Terrain Steel & Wood Wagon is built to last with a sturdy steel body and real wood sides. This special edition comes in a beautiful Ocean Blue color. The rugged, air-filled tires provide a smooth ride on any terrain.

title: LEGO Star Wars UCS X-Wing Starfighter (75355) - Red Five Standing By Edition

description: Two classic developmental toys in one bundle, now in an exciting Neon Pop colorway! The Rock-a-Stack helps with hand-eye coordination, while Baby's First Blocks introduces colors and shapes. Bright, vibrant colors stimulate baby's senses.

description: Learn and play with the LeapFrog 2-in-1 LeapTop Touch, now in Green! Kids can learn about letters, numbers, music and more. Easily converts from a laptop to a touch screen tablet. Features a pretend-play carrying handle for learning on the go.

description: Take on missions under the cover of darkness with the Hot Wheels Ultimate Garage - Night Ops Edition. Features exclusive glow-in-the-dark track pieces and two exclusive blacked-out die-cast cars. Park over 100 cars and evade the Robo T-Rex!

title: Classic Strategy Board Game - Deluxe Wood Edition
description: Experience the timeless strategy board game with this stunning Deluxe Wood Edition. Features a solid wood game board, premium wooden game pieces, and a felt-lined storage box. A beautiful collector's item that's built for generations of play.

description: This Marvel Legends Captain America figure features a highly detailed, unmasked head sculpt of Steve Rogers. Comes with his iconic shield and interchangeable hands for dynamic posing. A must-have for any Marvel Legends collector.
